name: MowZTower
description:
MowZTower is my entry for LudumDare 41 !
Theme was : Combine 2 incompatible Genres.
this is kind of Tetris and survival.

Goal is to make those monsters survive as long as you can.
The more monsters are alive, the more score you have.

Controls are pretty easy :
arrows to move blocks, w & x to rotate Blocks.
Space to Start; 
Enter To Restart;

Blocks:
Red are normal, cyan are iced, yellow are heavy,  grey are solid blocks;
Blue one is malus ^^
